Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2013 09:54PM CareBear1 wrote: I am 53 originally diagnosed Stage 1 in 2006. Had lumpectomy, chemo and radiation. Was on Arimidex for 4 1/2 years until it failed. Diagnosed Stage IV in 2011 with tumor on L 4 tsp caused spine fracture. Underwent minimally invasive surgery where they removed fractured bone and inserted cage to support spine and radiation. Took Femara for 6 months when it failed. Mets to spine (2 different places), skull, left femur and pelvis. Currently taking Afinitor/Aromasin since November 2011 mets are stable. I am currently unemployed and looking for a job. Lost my job as a Customer Service Manager in august. I don't post often but find great comfort and knowledge from reading all of your posts knowing that everyone understands what we are all living with.
Posts.Title: Roll Call 2013 LilSchatzie reader123
How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966

Posts.Content: Oct 5, 2012 07:16PM CareBear1 wrote: I have been on this combo since nov 2011. You can go on Afinitor website and print out a co pay assistance card where the max you pay is $25.00. There are questions they ask to determine if you are eligible for the card.
